root.name: Dragon Ball: Zenkai Battle Royal
root.description: Dragon Ball: Zenkai Battle Royal supports up to four simultaneous players either by linking four cabinets together, or though a network/online connection to the other three players. If no other players can be found a CPU opponent will be added into the match. The game utilizes GGPO netcode which is important for two reasons. Number one being that it's the best possible netcode for fighting games thus far, and two being that this game marks the first time GGPO has been used in a commercial 3D fighting game.
